posts.post_title: Fs/ Ft: T206 harry lumley psa 6! Tough common in nice grade, PRICE REDUCED!!
posts.post_content: Just recently upgraded, so i'm offering this one for sale. The card looks like an 8 except for left to right centering. 4 sharp corners, beautiful color and borders. Scans can be seen on ebay item# 200746601120. First $255 gets it....5/10 update, was sent an email asking about accepting offer of $240, will take if by paypal gift.....Would consider trade for another T206....Thanks
